human_readable_name: Leeser letter; Sampson, E.; Leeser, I., Rev.; Belton, TX; 17 February 1866

collection: Issac Leeser Collection at the Herbert D. Katz Center for Advanced Judaic Studies (University of Pennsylvania)
notes: Issac Leeser Collection at the Herbert D. Katz Center for Advanced Judaic Studies (University of Pennsylvania)
provenance: Transfer of Custody from the Hebrew Education Society, 10 March 1913, to the Library of the Dropsie College for Hebrew and Cognate Learning.
title: Letter; Sampson, E.; Leeser, I., Rev.; Belton, TX; 17 February 1866

transcription:
Belton, Bell Co. Texas
Feby 17th 1866
Rev. I. Leeser,
Philadelphia,
Dear Sir,
Many years have elapsed since I had the pleasure of addressing you, and now do so to ascertain whether you are still publishing your Portu-guese Hebrew & English Prayer Books and Pentateuchâ€”together with a Jewish version of the Bible in English, and if yea, you will please send me a catalogue  of prices of the same.
You will also inform me how I am to get the money (if I should order any of the books) to you. When I hear from you will inform how to forward to me such

that I may desire.
Very Respectfully
yours
E. Sampson.
